titles.title: A bill to provide for the appointment of 1 additional Federal district judge for the eastern district of Wisconsin, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S11170-11171)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

term.name: Advice and consent of the Senate

bill.summary: 8/10/1994--Introduced. Directs: (1) the President, by and with the consent of the Senate, to appoint an additional district judge for the eastern district of Wisconsin; and (2) the chief judge of that district to designate a judge who shall hold court for such district in Green Bay, Wisconsin.
